snippet: The estate of actress Joan Fontaine, who died a year ago aged 96, withdrew her Oscar from a much-anticipated auction when the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences threatened to sue over its sale, representatives of the estate said on Thursd...

headline.print_headline: Joan Fontaine Estate Pulls Oscar Sale Under Threat of Lawsuit
headline.main: Joan Fontaine Estate Pulls Oscar Sale Under Threat of Lawsuit

lead_paragraph: The estate of actress Joan Fontaine, who died a year ago aged 96, withdrew her Oscar from a much-anticipated auction when the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences threatened to sue over its sale, representatives of the estate said on Thursday.
